column2: without about 15 minutes left until my husband and I needed to leave for the airport (our friends were able to stay)
column3: I asked to speak with a manager.  I explained what had been going on and how frustrated we were
column4: and that we had very little time left before we had to leave to catch our flight.  The manager was incredibly nice
column6: and literally brought us our food within 5 minutes (and it was gorgeous and DELICIOUS . . . the egg parathas . . . you must get them).  I was incredibly impressed by her professionalism and attitude
column7: and I think it's a sign of a high quality restaurant when they have management that "gets it."
